title: (x) The Glasgow School of Art - custom designed (MetaDesign) {Franz}

The Glasgow School of Art   
I think this take not long   
dots with uc l

 [‹ (x) H R E Properties - Abbott Oldstyle {Mike F}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121103659/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5029 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Volvo ad font - Volvo Broad {Romesh} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121103659/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5034 "Go to next forum topic")
author: anonymous

comments.content: The dots are propably a custom job, look at the both L:s - they are different.
IIRC, it is a custom typeface created by Metadesign.

Eduardo's right, the face was designed by [Jürgen Huber](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121103659/http:/www.myfonts.com/person/huber/jurgen/) of [MetaDesign](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121103659/http:/www.metadesign.de/). It's called Hothouse. See [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121103659/http:/www.metadesign.de/html/en/117.html) article.
I have a font I made for work.. it looks very similar and is quite bad.. but your welcome to it if you want it..

That look a bit like "Crank 8", which is used throughout Esquire Magazine (although usually in a less-bold weight than this). Crank 8 is currently sitting atop my list of drool-worthy fonts, but it is apparently not available to the public. ![:-(](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121103659im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/sad.gif)
